column5: Hi, has anyone had any luck in the Holland River near Bradford (near the bridge)? What kinds of fish have you caught there?
I have caught pike, bass, and catfish in the Holland River from a boat. Hope that helps a little.
I believe they also catch crappie there as well.
I've tried that spot several times and have never had any luck.  It looks like a sweet spot for buckets and pike but I think it is way over fished.
Unless you wanna dunk worms with 50 other people.. don't bother
early spring is ok at times otherwise not much going on there

lol you asked the same thing on off, but were looking to fish at night. It's tough at night at a place like that, but the Stella Maris marina section has more bass and pike than all the other locations at the river i've seen. good luck mate
Sigh  Shimano, are you just going to ask about every bridge in Ontario?
